text: Mr Noah is the first extended play album by American recording artist Panda Bear, released in 2014. The title track was later featured on the 2015 full- length album Panda Bear Meets the Grim Reaper, while the other 3 songs were not. ==Track listing== == References == Category:2014 EPs Category:Domino Recording Company EPs Category:Panda Bear (musician) albums
title: Mr Noah
